thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 8 of 385
thread.title: Mike Swanner

author: Mike Swanner
title: Mike Swanner
text:
Never got a chance to rate Chanel for the bathroom remodel, if so would have rated them about 2.5 - 3! Some the subs used were very sloppy & had to finish the grout on last outside trim myself! Went through 3 project managers, 2 months late finishing the job, had to contact several of subs myself to get it done that fast!
Beeson has been great & done everything said he would & when told us would be done. Even worked around our schedule! Highly recommend Sean Beeson for any tile job you have
